entry.title: NARUTO: Ultimate Ninja STORM
entry.content:
ä¼˜æƒ ä¿¡æ¯ï¼ˆä»·æ ¼ï¼šUSDÂ 12.99 â†’ USDÂ 5.99 [USDÂ 5.99 ~ USDÂ 12.99]ï¼‰

ä»·æ ¼ï¼šUSDÂ 5.99

åº”ç”¨æè¿°

[Warning] Please Read Before Purchasing No refunds (including exchanges for other products, services, etc.) are available after purchase, regardless of the reason. Please ensure that your device is compatible via the app's Contact page (link below). https://bnfaq.channel.or.jp/title/3152 You are purchasing a license for digital goods. For full terms and conditions, please see the License Agreement below. [Game Summary] A Naruto game full of 3D competitive action! NARUTO: Ultimate Ninja STORM finally makes its way to smartphones! Experience the stories and battles of Naruto's childhood through beautiful graphics! Game Content Ultimate Mission Mode Relive the stories and famous battles from Naruto's childhood! You can freely move around the Hidden Leaf Village and take on missions and mini games! Free Battle Mode In Free Battle Mode, you can choose from 25 unique characters from Naruto's childhood and 10 support characters to enjoy a variety of powerful ninjutsu actions and battles! Changes for the App Easily activate ninjutsu, ultimate jutsu, and other actions with a tap! Even those playing the series for the first time can confidently enjoy the game! Plus, the following additional features and improvements have made the game easier to play: - New auto-save feature - New control mode selection for battle (casual/manual) - New battle assist feature (casual only) - Improved controls for battle and free movement - New retry feature for missions - Improved mini-game UI - Improved tutorial Play Notes - This game contains violent content. - Please pay attention to how long you play and avoid excessive gameplay. - æœ¬éŠæˆ²éƒ¨ä»½å…§å®¹æ¶‰åŠæš´åŠ›æƒ…ç¯€ - è«‹æ³¨æ„éŠæˆ²æ™‚é–“,é¿å…æ²‰è¿· [Number of Players] This is a single-player game only. [Storage] To download this app, you will need at least 3.5 GB of free space. When downloading, please ensure you have a strong internet connection and/or Wi-Fi environment. *Depending on your device, you may need more than the suggested storage amount. [Online] - There is no online battle mode. - Aside from the initial game download, you can play offline. - An internet connection is required to back up and transfer game data. Bandai Namco Entertainment Inc. Website: https://bandainamcoent.co.jp/english/ By downloading or installing this app, you agree to the Bandai Namco Entertainment Terms of Service. entry.title: Backyard Baseball '97
entry.content:
ä¼˜æƒ ä¿¡æ¯ï¼ˆä»·æ ¼ï¼šUSDÂ 4.99 â†’ USDÂ 0.99 [USDÂ 0.99 ~ USDÂ 4.99]ï¼‰

å…¨éƒ¨ä»·æ ¼ä¿¡æ¯

ä»·æ ¼ï¼šUSDÂ 0.99

åº”ç”¨æè¿°

Rediscover the joy of the original Backyard Baseball 1997! Build your roster from the iconic cast of 30 characters stacked with charming personalities and witty banter, and get the edge on the competition with power-ups, fireball pitches, super strength, and Pablo Sanchez! Play pick-up games, practice batting, and compete in single games or a whole season with simple, intuitive controls that anyone can master! Game Modes: Random Pick-up: A quick way to jump right in! The computer chooses a random team for you and itself, and the game starts immediately. Single Game: You take turns with the computer to choose players from a random pool of characters. Season: You create a team and manage it through a 14 game series. The opposing teams are computer generated. At the end of the season the best two teams advance to the BBL playoffs (best of 3). The winner advances to the championship series which consists of the Super Entire Nation Tournament (best of 3) and then the Ultra Grand Championship of the Universe Series (best of 5)! Batting Practice: Choose a batter and face Mr. Clanky for some batting practice. This is where youâ€™ll learn just when to click to make your chosen batter hit that ball! T-ball - Select T-ball mode for more accessible game play. Simply click to hit, run, and field! BACKYARD BASEBALL RULES The rules for Backyard Baseball are a hybrid of Pro and Little League rules: No leading off No Injuries Bunting is allowed Tagging up is allowed Stealing is allowed At our core, we are fans firstâ€“not just of video games but of the Backyard Sports franchise. Fans have asked for accessible and legal ways to play their original Backyard titles for years, and we are excited to deliver. Without having access to the source code, there are hard limitations on the experience we can create. Backyard Baseball '97 runs buttery smooth for iOS devices, looks better than ever, and creates a new installation for digital preservation within the Backyard Sports catalog that allows the next generation of fans to fall in love with the title that started it all.

entry.content:

What were your childhood games like? Onboard on an epic adventure of more than 20 hours through video games history filled with a ton of funny classical games references. From 2D RPG, through 3D vs fight to a shooter, a trading card game and more youâ€™ll get your fill of jumping from a game genre to another, never bored. â€œEvoland 2: A slight case of spacetime continuum disorderâ€ is not only one game but many, backboned with a story that will make you travel through time, discovering different art styles and video gaming technology. Released first on PC with 500.000 copies shipped, weâ€™re proud to share with you this experience carefully adapted for mobile devices. Â« Itâ€™s a mashup on a grand scale â€” and a successful one â€” bringing together many of the elements that make us love all those games individually. Â» - 9/10 GamesBeat â€œEvoland 2 manages to seamlessly blend an incredible number of genres into a single, wonderful experience.â€ 4/5 â€“ Hardcoregamer Compatible with MFI controllers. If you experience any problem with Evoland 2, please contact our customer support at hello@playdigious.com and give us as much as possible information on your problem.

entry.title: Afterplace
entry.content:
ä¼˜æƒ ä¿¡æ¯ï¼ˆä»·æ ¼ï¼šUSDÂ 6.99 â†’ USDÂ 1.99 [USDÂ 0.99 ~ USDÂ 6.99]ï¼‰

å…¨éƒ¨ä»·æ ¼ä¿¡æ¯

ä»·æ ¼ï¼šUSDÂ 1.99

åº”ç”¨æè¿°

An open world adventure game filled with silly characters and terrible secrets. Afterplace is an adventurous indie game for mobile devices. It's a huge open world, full of hidden secrets, treasures, and creatures. You'll run around the woods, fight monsters, and talk to ostensibly shady characters! All from your pocket! Be warned though - you never know what the forest might be hiding, and not all trails are paved. Labyrinths and dungeons are tucked away in the most concealed nooks. There are no waypoints in Afterplace. You'll have to forge your own path. Afterplace has been designed from the ground up to be a fast, fluid, beautiful experience for mobile. There are no virtual buttons. You can move and attack by touching anywhere. You can tap objects directly to interact or attack, or use two thumbs like a traditional controller. The game will adapt dynamically to your play style. Pick up and set down the game at your own pace, it will always save your progress. Afterplace is made to feel like a full-fledged indie adventure game that fits in your pocket. About the Author: Afterplace is made by one person, Evan Kice. A former software engineer from Austin TX, Evan quit his job (to the dismay of his friends and family) and has been working full time on Afterplace since early 2019. The initial game released in December of 2022, but Evan plans on continuing to support and polish the game when he can!
